thread.title: Freeman survives tough upbringing to emerge as Falcons star
thread.title_full: Freeman survives tough upbringing to emerge as Falcons star

author: PAUL NEWBERRY
title: Freeman survives tough upbringing to emerge as Falcons star
text:
Brynn Anderson Freeman survives tough upbringing to emerge as Falcons star 
Atlanta Falcons running back Devonta Freeman (24) reaches for the goal line as Washington Redskins inside linebacker Will Compton (51) during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in Atlanta. The play was ruled a touchdown then reversed. (AP Photo/Brynn Anderson) Curtis Compton Freeman survives tough upbringing to emerge as Falcons star 
Atlanta Falcons running back Devonta Freeman, left, celebrates his touchdown with Paul Soliai for a 19-16 lead over the Washington Redskins during the fourth quarter of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015 in Atlanta. (Curtis Compton/Atlanta Journal-Constitution via AP) MARIETTA DAILY OUT; GWINNETT DAILY POST OUT; LOCAL TELEVISION OUT; WXIA-TV OUT; WGCL-TV OUT; MANDATORY CREDIT Curtis Compton Freeman survives tough upbringing to emerge as Falcons star 
Atlanta Falcons running back Devonta Freeman catches a pass past Washington Redskins linebacker Keenan Robinson and runs it in for a touchdown for a 19-16 lead during the fourth quarter of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015 in Atlanta. (Curtis Compton/Atlanta Journal-Constitution via AP) MARIETTA DAILY OUT; GWINNETT DAILY POST OUT; LOCAL TELEVISION OUT; WXIA-TV OUT; WGCL-TV OUT; MANDATORY CREDIT Curtis Compton Freeman survives tough upbringing to emerge as Falcons star 
Atlanta Falcons running back Devonta Freeman catches a pass in front of Washington Redskins linebacker Will Compton and runs it in for a touchdown that was overturned on review during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015 in Atlanta. (Curtis Compton/Atlanta Journal-Constitution via AP) MARIETTA DAILY OUT; GWINNETT DAILY POST OUT; LOCAL TELEVISION OUT; WXIA-TV OUT; WGCL-TV OUT; MANDATORY CREDIT John Bazemore Freeman survives tough upbringing to emerge as Falcons star 
Atlanta Falcons running back Devonta Freeman (24) runs toward the end zone against the Washington Redskins during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in Atlanta. Freeman fumbled the ball and = Atlanta Falcons wide receiver Julio Jones recovered for a touchdown. (AP Photo/John Bazemore) John Bazemore Freeman survives tough upbringing to emerge as Falcons star 
Atlanta Falcons running back Devonta Freeman (24) scores a touchdown as Washington Redskins strong safety Trenton Robinson (34) and Washington Redskins cornerback Bashaud Breeland (26) defend during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/John Bazemore) Posted: Tuesday, October 13, 2015 7:28 pm Freeman survives tough upbringing to emerge as Falcons star Associated Press | 
FLOWERY BRANCH, Ga. (AP) — Devonta Freeman stops by his locker, but not for long. 
He hurriedly pulls on his No. 24 jersey, then hustles off to the weight room to get in a few more lifts before practice.
